li.span: Board of Education Minutes and Agendas

li.a: Board of Education Minutes and Agendas
What you need to know and how to talk to your kids about vaping

div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

br.h5: USD 364 is a proud member of the North Central Kansas League for athletics and activities and the Kansas Coalition of Innovative School Districts. #BulldogPride

div.style: border: solid 1px #ffffff; padding: 8px 10px; border-radius: 12px; display: inline-block; background: rgba(200,0,0,1.0); margin-left: 5px;
border: solid 1px #ffffff; padding: 8px 10px; border-radius: 12px; display: inline-block; background: rgba(200,0,0,1.0); margin-left: 5px;

div.p: ANNOUNCEMENT: The Marysville Class of 2020 graduation has been set for July 26th, 2020 at 2:30pm. We will work closely with KDHE and our local health department as we plan the event. Look for additional information as we get closer to the date. #classof2020
Thank you to the parents who participated in the parent survey. Due to technical difficulties it has been shut down.
Due to the weather today and road conditions USD 364 will not be serving any meals today. Please stay safe and healthy.
No meals served today, April 3rd, at Marysville pickup sites.

We still have several items left from the locker rooms. Please call in with locker # and will make arrangements to get it outside for pickup. This week will be the last week for pickup. Anything not picked up by Thur at 1:00 pm will be taken to Habitat.

p.a: Event: Golf: Varsity Tournament vs Concordia (Away)
Event: Tennis: Boys JV Triangular vs Manhattan (Away)
Event: Baseball: Boys JV Doubleheader vs Chapman (Away)

div.p: THE ANNUAL MHS ALUMNI REUNION SCHEDULED FOR MEMORIAL DAY WEEKEND HAS BEEN CANCELED FOR THIS YEAR!
Please see our district website for some Frequently Asked Questions on Continuous learning.USD364.org
A shout out to our USD364 food service department!! Thank you for your work and dedication in continuing to feed our young people!!!

Marysville USD 364
211 South 10th Street
Marysville, KS 66508
Ph (785) 562-5308
Fax (785) 562-5309
Copyright ©2020 Marysville USD 364. All rights reserved.
